text: @realDonaldTrump Best place to be is working on dealing with the coronavirus, but Trump is more worried about blaming dems and re-election.  Meanwhile, as Trump would ask, how is your 401(k) doing?  Dow down another 700 points.  Trump has no idea how to deal with a crisis.  Wake up, America!

entity.name: President Trump puts VP Pence in charge of US response to coronavirus
entity.description: Donald Trump said the risk to the US from the deadly coronavirus “remains very low” and that he has put Vice President Mike Pence in charge of the American response to the outbreak.
